content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, nice to meet you. Thank you for coming to see the apartment in New York. The apartment is 25 square meters and is located in a busy city area, with excellent transportation options nearby. I am looking for a responsible and long-term tenant who will pay the highest possible rental price. How much are you willing to pay per month for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 1000 Euros per month. Is that acceptable?

As for the size, the apartment is smaller than I expected. However, the location is very good. The apartment is located in a busy city area, with excellent transportation options nearby. I am willing to pay the highest possible rental price for this apartment, as long as the size is acceptable.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Baihu Li. While the size of the apartment may not be what you expected, the location is certainly a valuable feature. I appreciate your willingness to pay the highest possible rental price for this apartment. However, I am looking for a tenant who is willing to pay a premium for the location and other amenities that come with living in the city center. I am afraid that your offer of 1000 Euros per month may not be sufficient for this apartment. Is there any flexibility in your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to increase my offer by 100 Euros per month if necessary.

I understand that the location of the apartment is valuable, and I am willing to pay a premium for it. However, I am a student and my income is limited, so I have to be careful with my budget. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Baihu Li from China
